function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate attention to social aspects in residential building assessment tools","Impact":"Increased risk of social issues such as domestic violence during pandemics","Mitigation":"Include specific social indicators in assessment tools and prioritize the social pillar","Technologies":"Social impact assessments, community engagement initiatives","People":"Residents of residential buildings","Owner":"Building designers and sustainability assessment organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on pandemic resistance indicators in sustainability rating tools","Impact":"Inability to ensure better sustainability of residential buildings during and after epidemics","Mitigation":"Incorporate pandemic resistance indicators into existing tools or design new ones specifically for this purpose","Technologies":"Health and safety assessments, pandemic risk modeling","People":"Residents, public health officials, building designers","Owner":"Sustainability assessment organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient coverage of waste and wastewater management in assessment tools","Impact":"Inability to effectively manage waste and wastewater during pandemics","Mitigation":"Integrate waste and wastewater management subcategories into existing assessment tools","Technologies":"Waste management systems, wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Residents, environmental health agencies","Owner":"Building designers, environmental organizations"}]}
